https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hdpZkYviKSZXkKG93ETRIZKAiKT.jpg The border between Brazil and Paraguay: living on opposite sides of a big river, Brazilian boy Joca falls in love with indigenous-Paraguayan girl Basano. A magical tale of impossible love and adventure in this land full of memories of colonial wars and indigenous genocide. Don't Swallow My Heart, Alligator Girl
